comments:

Open a Navigator view and close that project containing the source for the 
launch

Is a launch view caching bug too? If we tried to re-retrive source, we would 
not find it.

Same problem occurrs if I open a navigator and close the project from within 
the debug perspective (and re-select a frame).

Fixed. Launch view is a resource delta listener, and clears cached info when a 
project is closed.

Verified.
I removed the visitor setter that was not used.
